get.description: This endpoint is used to check for the health of the application

503.description: The Health Check is not successful

post.description: This endpoint will help you create an integrator

message.example: The record has been successfully created.

get.description: This endpoint is used to retrieve an integrator details

message.example: The record has been successfully retrieved.

post.description: Login to your integrator account. This endpoint allows you to login to your account

message.example: login magic link sent to your email

get.description: This endpoint is used to generate an the API Key which can be used to authorize transactions and more

post.description: This endpoint will create a fiat wallet for the integrator.

currency.example: eg NGN or GHS or KES

message.example: Fiat wallet has been successfully created.

currency.example: eg NGN or GHS or KES

deposit_balance.description: Amount of the wallet that has been deposited so far

get.description: This endpoint will return all the fiat wallets created by the integrator.

message.example: Fiat wallet has been successfully retrieved.

currency.example: eg NGN or GHS or KES

deposit_balance.description: Amount of the wallet that has been deposited so far

get.summary: Get Integrator Fiat Wallet by Wallet ID
get.description: This endpoint will return the fiat wallet created by the integrator.

message.example: The wallet has been successfully retrieved.

currency.example: eg NGN or GHS or KES

deposit_balance.description: Amount of the wallet that has been deposited so far

patch.summary: Update Integrator Fiat Wallet by Wallet ID
patch.description: This endpoint will update the fiat wallet created by the integrator.

message.example: Fiat wallet has been successfully updated.

currency.example: eg NGN or GHS or KES

deposit_balance.description: Amount of the wallet that has been deposited so far

get.summary: Get Integrator Fiat Wallet by Currency
get.description: This endpoint will return the fiat wallet created by the integrator.

message.example: The wallet has been successfully retrieved.

currency.example: eg NGN or GHS or KES

deposit_balance.description: Amount of the wallet that has been deposited so far

post.description: This endpoint will transfer the deposit balance of the fiat wallet to the main balance.

walletId.description: The ID of the fiat wallet.

amount.description: The amount to transfer from the deposit balance to the main balance.

message.example: Transfer deposit balance has been successfully done.

currency.example: eg NGN or GHS or KES

deposit_balance.description: Amount of the wallet that has been deposited so far

post.description: The crypto wallet will contain the specified chain and coins an integrator desires to hold and one can create as many wallets as needed.

chain.description: The chain of the wallet.Its required if the wallet is a crypto wallet
chain.example: eg CELO or ETHEREUM or AVALANCHE or POLYGON

coin.example: eg CUSD or USDC or USDT

chain.description: The chain of the wallet.Its required if the wallet is a crypto wallet
chain.example: eg CELO or ETHEREUM or AVALANCHE or POLYGON

get.description: This endpoint will return all the crypto wallets created by the integrator.

message.example: Crypto wallet has been successfully retrieved.

chain.description: The chain of the wallet.Its required if the wallet is a crypto wallet
chain.example: eg CELO or ETHEREUM or AVALANCHE or POLYGON

get.summary: Get Integrator Crypto Wallet by Wallet ID
get.description: This endpoint will return the crypto wallet created by the integrator by passing the wallet id.

message.example: Crypto Wallet has been successfully retrieved.

coin.example: eg CUSD or USDC or USDT

chain.description: The chain of the wallet.Its required if the wallet is a crypto wallet
chain.example: eg CELO or ETHEREUM or AVALANCHE or POLYGON

post.description: This api will withdraw fiat from the integrators fiat wallet to the customers mobile money wallet.

get.description: This endpoint will return the status of the withdrawal request.

post.description: An integrators customers can initiate a deposit from their respective mobile money wallets.     An STK push will be sent to the customer and the respective amount will be deducted from their mobile money wallets and deposited into the integrators fiat wallet

post.description: NB: This API is Deprecated. Please use /offramp endpoint. This endpoint will create a request for off ramp and returns escrow address from which the integrator will send funds to.The request id generated will be used in /onchain/mobile-money api

post.summary: Send customer fiat from your crypto wallet
post.description: NB: This endpoint is deprecated.Please use /offramp endpoint.  This endpoint will withdraw from crypto transaction details you provided  into customer mobile money wallet

request_id.description: request id obtained from Generate Offramp Request api

get.description: NB: This endpoint is deprecated. Please use /offramp endpoint.  This endpoint will return the status of the withdrawal request.
This endpoint will return all the chains and coins that are supported by off ramp

post.description: This endpoint will create a offramp request for a customer

networkProvider.description: Network provider example MTN, GLO, AIRTEL

get.description: This endpoint will return the status of the withdrawal request.

post.description: Api is Deprecated, user /onramp api by Passing MobileMoney Object.Crypto deposits are where a customers mobile money wallet account is deducted a specific fiat amount which is then converted to a specified stablecoin amount and sent to the integrators crypto wallet. From there, the money/ stablecoin is transferred to the customers public address that matches the chain. This can also be called on-ramp

get.description: This API is deprecated, use /onramp/<referenceId>  This endpoint will be used to get the status of the deposit onchain request
This endpoint will be used to get the supported chains for deposit onchain

message.example: Onramp onchain supported chains retrieved successfully.

post.summary: Send from Fiat Wallet to Crypto Wallet
post.description: NB: Api Is Deprecated, kindly use /onramp Api without passing Bank or MobileMoney objects.  This api give you the opportunity to withdraw from your kotanipay fiat wallet to a crypto address

source_wallet.description: source wallet, should be fiat wallet

preview.description: preview, set preview to true to get transaction data with rates

message.example: Wallet Withdrawal has been successfully created
